summary: Simple textures replacer to be never again bald. 3 Hairlines textures and color as you wish... Probably the same of your character hair.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Description :[/b][/u]

Simple hairline textures, work like warpaints, makeup or tattoos.

The concept is already exist but my mod give a easy way to put the desired color. 

There aren't plugin because I don't known how to create ^^'. Replace dirt face texture. But you could use my textures to replace all of you want for your personal

use of course.

Now when your character wear a helmet or hat, he/she will not be bald anymore because hairline stay. Like you could see in screenshots.

It's just necessary to use character creation mod like Racemenu or Enhanced Character Edit to change color as you wish.

My mods is free to use. I just ask do not publish my work on another site.



[u][b]Recommendations :[/b][/u]

If you want same quality of hairline in screenshots, it's recommanded to use HighResTexturesPack or you could use my texture to replace warpaints, tattoos or

makeup addons mods for your personal use of course. In fact the high quality in warpaint, makeup or tattoos mods it's just works ! But not with vanilla game 

witheout HighResTexturesPack. Anyway you could use hairline texture with medium texture quality but the first hairline "short hair" will be ugly and the other

less hairy detail.

P.S.: Sorry for my English. Risk of French synthaxe.



[u][b]Compatibility :

[/b][/u]Indeed my mods is compatible with all hair mods, KS Hairdos, Apachii Sky Hair, Ninirim Hair style, TD18 Lore-Friendly Hair, Ponytails... etc... etc...

Maybe if people can say me where to find Horizon Zero Dawn Aloy Hair for Skyrim, I would be really grateful. (I know for Falllout 4)
